subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: It seemed that everything, both man and the elements, conspired to turn the inaugural Korean Grand Prix into either the biggest fiasco of the year, or one of its most exciting and unpredictable races.
snippet: It seemed that everything, both man and the elements, conspired to turn the inaugural Korean Grand Prix into either the biggest fiasco of the year, or one of its most exciting and unpredictable races.
